brief_summary.textblock:
This non-interventional study will evaluate the use and efficacy of RoActemra/Actemra
      (tocilizumab) in patients with moderate to severe rheumatoid arthritis. Eligible patients
      initiated on RoActemra/Actemra treatment according to the approved label will be followed
      for 6 months.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Non-Interventional Study Evaluating Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients Treated With RoActemra/Actemra (Tocilizumab)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Adult patients, >/= 18 years of age

          -  Moderate to severe rheumatoid arthritis according to the revised (1987) ACR criteria

          -  Patients in whom the treating physician has made the decision to commence
             RoActemra/Actemra treatment (in accordance with the local label); this can include
             patients who have received RoActemra/Actemra treatment within 8 weeks prior to the
             enrolment visit

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients who have received RoActemra/Actemra more than 8 weeks prior to the enrolment
             visit

          -  Patients who have previously received RoActemra/Actemra in a clinical trial or for
             compassionate use

          -  Treatment with any investigational agent within 4 weeks (or 5 half-lives of the
             investigational agent, whichever is longer) before starting treatment with
             RoActemra/Actemra

          -  History of autoimmune disease or any joint inflammatory disease other than rheumatoid
             arthritis

study_pop.textblock:
Patients with rheumatoid arthritis initiated on treatment with RoActemra/Actemra
        (tocilizumab)

clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-Center, Non-inteRventional Study in rheumatOid Arthritis patientS Treated With Tocilizumab in Serbia- ACROSS; (Part of Global Umbrella Project)

oversight_info.authority: Serbia: Agency for medicines and medical devices

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients on RoActemra/Actemra at 6 months after treatment initiation

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical/demographic patient characteristics at initiation of treatment
Efficacy: Response according to total joint count evaluation by DAS28/EULAR/SDAI/CDAI/ACR

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
